summary: A demonstration script that uses the Instructor library with OpenAI to interpret user input as one of several action types (search, lookup, finish, generic action) defined by Pydantic models, then executes the selected operation via simple helper methods.
business_intent: Showcase how to build AIâ€‘driven workflows that dynamically choose and run different actions based on natural language input, serving as a reference implementation for developers integrating language models with typed action handling.
